Name: Return to Light
Description: Misha's mother has been away for quite a while. She may need some help...
QuestDesc: Misha's mother has been away for quite a while. She may need some help...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You hand Misha the Academy stickers, supplies, and the first note.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So that's what happened...

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {Male=big brother;Female=big sister}, for doing so much for Mom and me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Could I ask you for one last thing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Misha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Help me cover the tent with Soliskin stickers, please. I... I miss Mom.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
After you finish collecting the stickers, the Soliskin slowly drift away.
Only two remain, a large one and a small one that seem familiar, watching you with eyes full of gratitude.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This sticker's scent... I smell other stickers nearby!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's search the area carefully.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This sticker's scent... I smell other stickers nearby!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I smell something familiar. There should be more stickers nearby!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This sticker's scent... I smell other stickers nearby!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's search the area carefully.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This sticker's scent... I smell other stickers nearby!

Dialogues.Speaker: Angry Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't you dare touch Vantier's stickers!

Dialogues.Speaker: Intervening Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back off! Those are for her daughter, Misha!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please calm down. I'm here to help Misha find her mother.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You tell the Outcasts why you're here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So that's how it is... I'm sorry. I was out of line.

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Vantier is Misha's mother and the area's delivery courier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She's always been kind to us. She once helped us. You know how most people look down on Outcasts.

Dialogues.Speaker: Friendly Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So we're more than willing to help her in return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Friendly Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lately, the Void Storm has been getting worse. Cargo-carrying Exoswarm will get confused and lose their way in the storm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Friendly Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Vantier stuck these stickers, imbued with her own resonance, on tents along the route. If the Exoswarm lose their way, they can follow that familiar frequency back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Friendly Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She can infuse her frequency into the stickers, that's Vantier's Forte.

Dialogues.Speaker: Friendly Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her Forte takes form in the care and worry she feels for her daughter Misha...

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These stickers were meant for her daughter. They're precious to both of them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Putting them on occupied tents adds an extra layer of protection.

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Vantier said that if she doesn't come back, then we should return the stickers to Misha...

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's already been a week, and she's still not back...

Dialogues.Speaker: Friendly Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Vantier's a very experienced courier. We can wait a bit longer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Friendly Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hope she's alright...

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll make sure these stickers reach Misha.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Outcasts exchanged glances, pausing in thought for a moment, then reach a decision.

Dialogues.Speaker: Now-calm Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take the stickers. We trust you with them.
